bestViewPoint._instruction: Add the coordinate point identifying the best view of this annotation in space.

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this annotation.

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this annotation.

displayColor._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (RGB) for this annotation.

inspiredBy._instruction: Add one or several (source) images that inspired the definition of this annotation.

internalFileIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.

laterality._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body or bilateral organ that this annotation is defined in.

namingTerm._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities that name this annotation.

relatedAtlasTerm._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities of registered brain atlas annotations to which this annotation is related to.

visualizedIn._instruction: Add the image in which this annotation is visualized in.
